title: "03 | Sovereign"
author: "C.O."
date: "March 2025"
draft: true

The sovereignty of the LORD is present throughout scripture. HE is, was and is to come! There is nothing that compares to HIM! We can rely on the omnipotent, omnipresent GOD for all that we need.

Meditate on these verses to gain wisdom:

-   Week 1
    -   Psalms 103:19
-   Week 2
    -   2 Chronicles 20:6
-   Week 3
    -   Colossians 1:16-17
-   Week 4
    -   Timothy 6:15-16
